meanings.definition: Meitneriums: a chemical element with the symbol Mt and atomic number 109.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study meitneriums to learn more about its properties.
meanings.sent2: The periodic table includes meitneriums as one of the elements.
meanings.sent3: When the meitneriums threw a party, all the other elements wanted to join!
meanings.sent4: The discovery of meitneriums was like finding a hidden treasure in the scientific world.
meanings.sent5: In the lab, the researchers handled meitneriums with extreme caution due to its reactivity.
